languages.text: "{name}". {n}Маражай с деланно скучающим видом рассматривает закованные в металл пальцы.{/n} "До меня дошли слухи, что ты уделяешь прискорбно много внимания некоторым членам своей свиты. Ты хочешь оскорбить меня своим небрежением? Если ты намеревал{mf|ся|ась} добавить к пиршествам новую забаву — нужно было сначала спросить об этом меня. Я не терплю возни за спиной".

"{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "A regrettable rumour has reached me that you have been lavishing attention on certain members of your circle. Do you mean to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another source of entertainment to our feasts, you should have asked my permission first. I will not tolerate being kept in the dark."
languages.original_text: "{name}". {n}Маражай с деланно скучающим видом рассматривает закованные в металл пальцы.{/n} "До меня дошли слухи, что ты уделяешь прискорбно много внимания некоторым членам своей свиты. Ты хочешь оскорбить меня своим небрежением? Если ты намеревал{mf|ся|ась} добавить к пиршествам новую забаву — нужно было сначала спросить об этом меня. Я не терплю возни за спиной".

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "Rumour has it that you have been giving regrettably lavish attention to certain members of your circle. Do you want to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another means of entertainment to the feasts, you were supposed to ask my permission first. I hate it when something is making noise behind my back."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "Rumour has it that you have been giving regrettably lavish attention to certain members of your circle. languages.text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイは金属に包まれた彼の指を、刺々しくも退屈そうな雰囲気で調べる。{/n}「残念な噂が聞こえてきたぜ。お前が決まったやつにばっかり構ってるってな。俺をほったらかしにして馬鹿にするつもりか？もし俺らの宴に何か別のお楽しみを持ってきたいってんなら、まず俺の許可を取るべきだったな。俺は秘密にされるってことに我慢ならねえんだ」
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "A regrettable rumour has reached me that you have been lavishing attention on certain members of your circle. Do you mean to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another source of entertainment to our feasts, you should have asked my permission first. I will not tolerate being kept in the dark."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイは金属に包まれた彼の指を、刺々しくも退屈そうな雰囲気で調べる。{/n}「残念な噂が聞こえてきたぜ。お前が決まったやつにばっかり構ってるってな。俺をほったらかしにして馬鹿にするつもりか？もし俺らの宴に何か別のお楽しみを持ってきたいってんなら、まず俺の許可を取るべきだったな。俺は秘密にされるってことに我慢ならねえんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “{name}”。{n}玛拉斋脸上挂着百无聊赖的凶狠神情，审视着带着金属利刃的手指。{/n}“我听到了令人遗憾的谣言，说你对圈子里的某些成员过于关注。你像这样有意疏忽我，是打算侮辱我吗？如果你打算为我们的盛宴带来新的娱乐方式，你应该提前征得我的同意才行。我不允许你把我蒙在鼓里。”
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "A regrettable rumour has reached me that you have been lavishing attention on certain members of your circle. Do you mean to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another source of entertainment to our feasts, you should have asked my permission first. I will not tolerate being kept in the dark."

traits.locale_text: “{name}”。{n}玛拉斋脸上挂着百无聊赖的凶狠神情，审视着带着金属利刃的手指。{/n}“我听到了令人遗憾的谣言，说你对圈子里的某些成员过于关注。你像这样有意疏忽我，是打算侮辱我吗？如果你打算为我们的盛宴带来新的娱乐方式，你应该提前征得我的同意才行。我不允许你把我蒙在鼓里。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « {name}. » {n}Marazhai examine ses doigts bardés de métal avec une expression d'ennui mâtinée d'animosité.{/n} « Une rumeur regrettable m'est parvenue aux oreilles. Apparemment, vous auriez manifesté un empressement excessif envers certains membres de votre cercle rapproché. Chercheriez-vous à m'insulter par votre négligence ? Si vous souhaitiez varier les plaisirs de nos orgies, vous auriez dû me demander la permission avant. Je ne supporte pas les cachotteries. »
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "A regrettable rumour has reached me that you have been lavishing attention on certain members of your circle. Do you mean to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another source of entertainment to our feasts, you should have asked my permission first. I will not tolerate being kept in the dark."

traits.locale_text: « {name}. » {n}Marazhai examine ses doigts bardés de métal avec une expression d'ennui mâtinée d'animosité.{/n} « Une rumeur regrettable m'est parvenue aux oreilles. Apparemment, vous auriez manifesté un empressement excessif envers certains membres de votre cercle rapproché. Chercheriez-vous à m'insulter par votre négligence ? Si vous souhaitiez varier les plaisirs de nos orgies, vous auriez dû me demander la permission avant. Je ne supporte pas les cachotteries. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai estudia sus dedos, envueltos en metal, con aire de aburrimiento.{/n} «Ha llegado a mis oídos un lamentable rumor, según el cual estás dedicando tu atención a ciertos miembros de tu círculo. ¿Intentas ofenderme con tu negligencia? Si lo que buscabas era traer más entretenimiento a nuestros banquetes, deberías haberme pedido permiso. No me gusta que me tengan a oscuras».
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "A regrettable rumour has reached me that you have been lavishing attention on certain members of your circle. Do you mean to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another source of entertainment to our feasts, you should have asked my permission first. I will not tolerate being kept in the dark."

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai estudia sus dedos, envueltos en metal, con aire de aburrimiento.{/n} «Ha llegado a mis oídos un lamentable rumor, según el cual estás dedicando tu atención a ciertos miembros de tu círculo. ¿Intentas ofenderme con tu negligencia? Si lo que buscabas era traer más entretenimiento a nuestros banquetes, deberías haberme pedido permiso. No me gusta que me tengan a oscuras».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai untersucht seine metallbedeckten Finger mit zur Schau gestellter Langeweile.{/n} "Mich hat das bedauernswerte Gerücht erreicht, dass Ihr bestimmten Mitgliedern Eures Zirkels viel Aufmerksamkeit geschenkt habt. Wollt Ihr mich beleidigen, indem Ihr mich vernachlässigt? Falls Ihr zu unseren Festmahlen eine weitere Quelle der Unterhaltung mitbringen wolltet, hättet Ihr mich vorher um Erlaubnis fragen sollen. Ich toleriere es nicht, im Unklaren gelassen zu werden."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "A regrettable rumour has reached me that you have been lavishing attention on certain members of your circle. Do you mean to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another source of entertainment to our feasts, you should have asked my permission first. I will not tolerate being kept in the dark."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai untersucht seine metallbedeckten Finger mit zur Schau gestellter Langeweile.{/n} "Mich hat das bedauernswerte Gerücht erreicht, dass Ihr bestimmten Mitgliedern Eures Zirkels viel Aufmerksamkeit geschenkt habt. Wollt Ihr mich beleidigen, indem Ihr mich vernachlässigt? Falls Ihr zu unseren Festmahlen eine weitere Quelle der Unterhaltung mitbringen wolltet, hättet Ihr mich vorher um Erlaubnis fragen sollen. Ich toleriere es nicht, im Unklaren gelassen zu werden."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "{name}." {n} Marazhai, metal kaplı parmaklarını sert bir can sıkıntısı havasıyla inceliyor.{/n} "Kulağıma, yakın çevrendeki birine büyük bir cömertlikle ilgini yönelttiğine dair talihsiz bir söylenti çalındı. İhmalinle beni aşağılamaya mı çalışıyorsun? Eğer ki niyetin, ziyafetlerimize başka bir eğlence kaynağı daha katmaksa önce benden izin alman gerekirdi. Haberdar edilmemeye müsamaha gösteremem."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai is examining his metal-clad fingers with an air of pointed boredom.{/n} "A regrettable rumour has reached me that you have been lavishing attention on certain members of your circle. Do you mean to insult me with your neglect? If your intent was to bring another source of entertainment to our feasts, you should have asked my permission first. I will not tolerate being kept in the dark."

İhmalinle beni aşağılamaya mı çalışıyorsun? Eğer ki niyetin, ziyafetlerimize başka bir eğlence kaynağı daha katmaksa önce benden izin alman gerekirdi. Haberdar edilmemeye müsamaha gösteremem."
